segments.text: Hello , Mr David Richton , this is Min Wang calling from network , i am calling about the reporter position you advertised on the internet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , yes , Mr Wang , i look at your resume you emailed , very impressive , are you a P . M . ~ meet someone like you , i was thinking of calling you this afternoon , and having a telephone interview .
segments.speaker: S2
